bibl.title: The Marrow of Hermes.
Images of Man in Ancient and Medieval Thought. Studia Gerardo Verbeke ab amicis et collegis dicata
bibl.author: Turner, Eric G.

bibl.note: Magical spell from Roman Oxyrhynchus. About A.D. 300 (?), but it could be a whole century earlier. Will be republished in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
Turner Eric G., The Marrow of Hermes.
Images of Man in Ancient and Medieval Thought. Studia Gerardo Verbeke ab amicis et collegis dicata (Louvain, 1976) pp. 169-173 et 1 pl.
